name: Point final.
description:
Point final is an art-game developed by french video game students. Walk in an unique landscape, read messages dropped by previous travellers and leave your own text to the next.

There is only few things to do right there.

Walk (D or right arrow)  

Read (Left click).

Write (Tab)

Die (M)

And that's is.

Play online directly : Here.
